haveAccount: Don't have an account? Get started
scheduleFormSubtitle: Tell us your idea and let's book a meeting.
aboutHeader: We accompany you at every stage and we become your best ally!
aboutText: We are a Software Development company that seeks to support entrepreneurs like YOU to materialize their ideas, developing scalable and attractive solutions that adapt to the needs of each business.
header: Best Web and Mobile Application Development Company
title: Your trusted development partner
subtitle: We provide web and mobile application development services to global companies. Hire the best developers, at affordable prices, based on the needs of your project. Products adapted to your business, with 100% project delivery success.
servicesTitle: Hire the best services for your project
servicesText: Flembee is a top web design agencies and software development company, founded in Caracas, Venezuela. Our great team of developers are committed and available for projects that pose a great challenge. We use the best trending web technologies, front-end technologies like ReactJs, and back-end technologies like Node.js to develop responsive and custom websites, web apps and e-commerce solutions.
servicesText2: We also develop native mobile apps for Android and iOS and cross-platform mobile apps with React Native.
contactHeader: Tell us about your idea and we will make it happen.
contactText: If you have any entrepreneurial idea in less than 24 hours we will be contacting you to schedule a meeting to gather requirements or if you prefer, receive consultancies for your project.
discoverText: Customers are our partners. We explore their requirements in depth and apply the strategy to make their project come true.
designText: We focus on design. Our goal is to create something unique that is easy for our clients.
developText: We develop with the best technologies. We build with efficiency and skill, creating flexible and scalable, business-oriented solutions.
deliverText: We use agile methodologies. Our iterative approach allows us to better organize our work and we are always looking to improve what we do.
ourServicesText: We constantly advance with new technologies. Stay up to date with our services.
service1Text: We create custom web applications and solutions. We help you grow your business using the best technologies.
service2Text: We develop intuitive and attractive applications for Android, iOS and multiplatform for companies and consumers.
service3Text: We advise and guide our clients during the development and growth of their projects.
service4Text: Starting with concept, information architecture, visual identity, and UI / UX design, we deliver dazzling experiences for maximum user engagement.
service5Text: We help you in managing secure and stable infrastructure for Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery for faster launches.
service6Text: We guarantee that your software application is successful with manual and automated testing services.
service7Text: We develop innovative and customized IoT solutions to simplify and automate complex business processes to save overall operating costs.
service8Text: We offer interactive, visually engaging and exciting gaming experiences on mobile, console, and virtual reality platforms.
service9Text: We innovate next-generation AI solutions and applications for various industries.
service10Text: Hire your own team of developers for your short, long-term or permanent software project with guaranteed delivery.
guaranteeText1_2: Develop with us and get results on time. We promise to make you feel satisfied.
ourProjectsText: We continuously improving but never delayed.
project1Text: Brunch & Meet increase audience engagement by attending events on different topics.
project2Text: Arambee improve the management of the commercial process, through a sales system integrated.
project3Text: Krypto is a web platform that allows you to quote in real time the value of a certain cryptocurrency in different FIAT currencies.
project4Text: In Kaboom create groups with your friends and during the 24 hour period, the information that you share will disappear.
technologiesSubTitle: We work with the best innovative technologies for development.
anyDoubt: Do you have any doubt? We will contact you immediately.

footerDesc: Develop with us and get results on time. Our commitment is to make the customer feel satisfied. We accompany you at each stage of the growth of your technological project.
